description: A city built on water known for its shipbuilding industry and the annual Aqua Laguna storm that floods the lower levels of the city.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Aqua Laguna Salt
keyEvents.description: Sanji discovers that the Aqua Laguna storm creates special salt on Water 7's rooftops when seawater evaporates after flooding the city.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals a unique property of Water 7's Aqua Laguna phenomenon and its connection to potentially all the world's seas.

name.japanese: バンバンの浮遊レストラン

description: A small floating restaurant in Water 7 operated by the elderly chef Banban. Despite its modest appearance, it serves exceptional food made with special Aqua Laguna salt.

keyEvents.title: First Appearance of Banban's Restaurant
keyEvents.description: Chimney brings Sanji to a small floating restaurant operated by Banban, where Sanji will discover the secret of Aqua Laguna salt.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Sanji learns about special cooking ingredients and Banban's connection to Zeff.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Tastes Banban's Cooking
keyEvents.description: Sanji samples Banban's fried rice at the restaurant and is amazed by its exceptional flavor.
keyEvents.significance: The moment that drives the episode's plot and Sanji's investigation into the secret ingredient.

keyEvents.title: Revelation of Banban's Past
keyEvents.description: At his restaurant, Banban shows Sanji a photograph revealing his friendship with Zeff and their shared All Blue dream.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a meaningful connection between Sanji's mentor and this location.

statusHistory.reason: Restaurant is operational in this episode
